pages.text: $(info) A $(item)Crate$() can hold a small number of items.
$(info) A $(item)Shelf$() can hold a small number of items.$(p)$(info) A $(item)Shelf$() can be placed in either a forward or back position.
$(info) A $(item)Stash$() can hold a larger number of a single item.
$(info) A $(item)Wood Rack$() can hold a small number of a $(thing)logs$().$(p)$(info) $(thing)Logs$() of the same type will settle to the bottom.
